alert.note: Alert for Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:28PM CDT until August 08 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL WEBSTER AND NORTHWESTERN WRIGHT COUNTIES... At 228 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Hartville, or 15 miles east of Marshfield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Duncan... Odin... Grovespring... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
